participant_1.background:
I am a swimmer who is proud of my family but sometimes feel disconnected from them.
I make sure my beta fish travels with me when I move.
I bought a set of dice for my favorite tabletop game.
I love my family and friends because they support me and help me grow.
I don't go to Comic Con because it is not my kind of thing.

participant_2.background:
I loved playing in the rain with my friends, even though we would get soaked.
i drive a nice car.
i have survived near death experiences.
i look forward to eating at restaurants.
My first cup of coffee in the morning is the best part of my day.

content.text: Hello! How is your day going so far?
It's going good so far! I just woke up and had my first cup of coffee. It's the best part of my day!
I love coffee! It's one of the only things that gets me going in the morning.
Me too! I love drinking it while I'm reading the news or listening to music.
I'm a swimmer and I love it! I'm proud of my family and friends because they support me and help me grow.
That's great! I love swimming too! It's a great way to stay in shape.
I used to love playing in the rain with my friends, even though we would get soaked.
I don't think I've ever played in the rain before. I'm not sure I would enjoy it!
It's really fun! It's a great way to cool off on a hot day.
I might have to try it sometime! I love playing games too. I have a set of dice for my favorite tabletop game.
That's awesome! I've never played a tabletop game before.
You should try it sometime! It's a lot of fun.
I might have to! I'm always looking for new things to try.
Well, if you do, let me know! I'd be happy to play with you sometime.
